block.p: BIALKIN-Robert. Passed away September 24, 2000 at home in Amherst, New Hampshire. Son of Samuel and Lillian Bialkin. Husband of Harriet. Father of Deborah Eisenberg, Rachel Behrens, Jesse and Rodney, brother of Kenneth and the late Edith Barth. Also survived by five grandchildren. Services at The Riverside, 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave, 11:30AM Tues., September26. N Y City, NY. No flowers, please.
